question:
Consider the following statements about the Pharma Jan Samadhan Scheme (PJSS):
  1. It is an initiative by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
  2. It aims at consumer grievance redressal with help of a web-enabled system created by National Pharmaceutical Pricing Authority (NPPA)
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. Pharma Jan Samadhan Scheme (PJSS) is an initiative by the Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers and not by the Ministry of Health & Welfare. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The scheme aims at a speedy and effective complaint redressal system with respect to availability and pricing of medicines through a web-enabled portal developed by the National Pharmaceutical Pricing Authority (NPPA).
